thread.title: Comment on Big Blue Madness 2015 Guest List by berkley831
thread.title_full: Comment on Big Blue Madness 2015 Guest List by berkley831

author: berkley831
title: Comment on Big Blue Madness 2015 Guest List by berkley831
text:
Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 21 responses to “Big Blue Madness 2015 Guest List” Wildcat_fan5 October 12, 2015 at 8:27   
Any news on Skal? Saw where an NBA GM said no way he would be eligible to play. Brian October 12, 2015 at 8:37 pm | Permalink 
My only question is, why would an NBA exec know anything about what the NCAA is going to do? Parvenu October 12, 2015 at 9:04 pm | Permalink 
Sure you “saw” that. Who was the GM. Link? Megan October 12, 2015 at 9:09 pm | Permalink 
I saw it, too. It’s the first result I got when I googled Skal. Wasn’t sure about the credibility of the source, though. intheshadow October 13, 2015 at 12:04 am | Permalink 
“ESPN’s Jeff Goodman reported that Kentucky superstar freshman Skal Labissiere has not yet been cleared to play by the NCAA. The organization reportedly has concerns about his guardian Gerald Hamilton, who brought the center to the U.S. from Haiti. We haven’t heard much since, but FOX Sports Australia basketball writer Olgun Uluc reports that one NBA executive doesn’t think Labissiere will play this season.” Eric October 12, 2015 at 8:29   
I’d say most people hope not on drake coming back. Most people have know idea who he is or what he does. CATSFANINBAMA October 12, 2015 at 10:13 pm | Permalink 
Most people have no idea who Drake is? Are you 80 and hanging out at Catholic bingo halls? Redneck Cat Fan October 12, 2015 at 8:39   
Drake? Again? Why not Montgomrey Gentry?!? This is on you Mitch!! CATSFANINBAMA October 12, 2015 at 10:16 pm | Permalink 
Our players and recruits probably don’t even know who Montgomery Gentry is. Drake loves Kentucky and recruits are far more likely to like Drake. I care most about impressing and exciting them. Matt October 12, 2015 at 9:16   
Any news on what part of the Arena the stage for BBM will be? I know sometimes it is in the end zone where the student section usually is, and a couple of times it has been where the team benches are on the sidelines. October 12, 2015 at 9:59   
I hope its billy ray Cyrus baby. I swear to gd I do!!! October 12, 2015 at 10:18   
Thanks Enis October 12, 2015 at 10:51 pm | Permalink 
Did you seriously just respond to yourself? Smh… me October 12, 2015 at 10:29   
College Spun? Really? That’s your source? WOW! Troll much? me October 12, 2015 at 10:32   
And dude is from Australia….And a recruiting expert in the US? Paging Marc Maggard…Marc Maggard your table is ready…. me October 12, 2015 at 10:33   
and like 16 years old….really? https://twitter.com/OlgunUluc Leuther October 12, 2015 at 11:46   
My sources continue to say that Giles is a lock for Dook… ArnoldthePig October 12, 2015 at 11:52 pm | Permalink 
yeah, but Cal is the real deal… Leuther is a Tool October 12, 2015 at 11:53 pm | Permalink 
Leuther also said Randle was a lock for Texas/Kansas, and the Twins were headed to Maryland. Dude October 12, 2015 at 11:59 pm | Permalink 
Way to really go out on a limb there, Leuther. You must have fantastic “sources”. Any idea where Miles Bridges is headed? berkley831 October 13, 2015 at 12:08 am | Permalink | Reply 
Hey what about spurer? Big blue effect. Quit in middle of year what’s happening in sec football Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
